cards.title: Bitch
powers: Each Dog in play may deal 2 melee damage to a target
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may take a card from their trash into their hand
Reduce damage dealt by environment targets by 2 until the start of your next turn

cards.title: Heel!
body: Reveal cards from the top of either your deck or your trash until you reveal a Dog. Put it into play. Return the other cards and shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: Master only asks for dogs to come to the front stairs{BR}if it is time for walkies!

cards.title: Find!
body: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each target revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other cards back into the deck

flavorQuotes.text: Find her! Find Skitter! Hurt! Kill!

cards.title: Guard!
body: Select up to X targets, where X = the number of Dog cards in play. Reduce damage dealt to those targets by 2 until the start of your next turn.
cards.flavorText: "Sirius, guard!" she pointed toward the front door of the building. "Bentley! Guard!"

cards.title: Hold!
body: Destroy a target with up to X HP, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 2.
cards.flavorText: The dog lurched forward and placed both front paws on Mannequin's body, pinning his arm and chest.

cards.title: Kill!
body: Deal a target X melee damage, where X = the number of Dog cards in play * 3

cards.title: Fetch!
body: Reveal the top X cards of a deck, where X = the number of Dog cards in play + 2. For each equipment or device card revealed in this way, either discard it or put it into play. Shuffle the other cards back into the deck
cards.flavorText: If only humans were as reliable, as easy to train.

cards.title: Veterinary Care
body: Restore all Dog cards to maximum HP.
cards.flavorText: Like this, his body won't just kill them, but it can kill the disease. He'll be fine by tomorrow.

cards.title: Whistle
body: At the start of your turn you may draw a card.
At the end of your turn you may play an Order card.
cards.flavorText: Bitch slipped past the pair of them, reaching the front door. I could hear her whistle at a volume that I doubted I could scream.

cards.title: The Hunt
body: At the start of your turn each Dog in play may deal 1 melee damage to a target
cards.flavorText: If I ordered them to kill you, Brutus would have torn out your throat before you could scream.

cards.title: Have a Ride
body: Reduce damage dealt to hero targets by environment cards by 1
cards.flavorText: Leaping from rooftop to rooftop was not as awesome or efficient as it was on TV and in the movies.

cards.title: Judas
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: The dog's prehensile tail wrapped around Aegis' torso.

cards.title: Angelica
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: Angelica positioned herself between enemy and master, and Glory Girl hit the dog broadside.

cards.title: Brutus
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage

cards.title: Kuro
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: Last one killed my dogs. Killed Brutus, Judas, Kuro, Bullet, Milk and Stumpy and Axel and Ginger. When do we attack?

cards.title: Bullet
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: Leviathan pulled away, only for a dog to snag his arm, drag him off balance.

cards.title: Ginger
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage

cards.title: Milk
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: All sorts of breeds, different sizes and shapes.

cards.title: Stumpy
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: I fell, and in a heartbeat, the other two dogs were on me.

cards.title: Axel
cards.body: At the end of your turn this card deals itself 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: ...resembling a cross between a lizard and a tiger, with tangles of muscle and bone where it ought to have skin, scales or fur.
